article.title: Contribution on the project Collection of XSLT Examples

section.title: What did I work on?
section.para: My task was to create three jsp sites with examples of transformations.

I also created the floating navbar with all of the subdomains of our web-app. It changes colors of currently open site in the navbar. There were some problems with the alignment but in the end everything works perfectly.

I designed the example pages, transformation page and created stylesheet for the whole web-app. It contains mainly styling of the tables, horizontal lines, highlighting of the code in the text and boxes for displaying the code.
Last, but not least I helped with redirecting of the pages.
